name: 10th Edition of International Conference on Neurology and Brain Disorders
content: Magnus Group invites you to share in the 10th Edition of International Conference on Neurology and Brain Disorders (INBC 2024) from October 21-23, 2024, in Baltimore, Maryland, USA in Hybrid Format either In person or online INBC 2024's theme is" Neuroscience Unveiled decoding Brain mystifications." It promises to explore the rearmost advancements in neurology and brain conditions. This Neurology Conferences provides a platform for staying streamlined on neuroscience trends and fostering interdisciplinary conversations. Join us to make Neuroscience Conference 2024 a memorable event with knowledge exchange, networking, and cooperative openings. Your presence will enrich this Brain Disorders Conference. We look forward to seeing you in Baltimore or online. Please respond soon. Detailed information: Conference: 10th Edition of International Conference on Neurology and Brain Disorders (INBC 2024) Dates: October 21-23, 2024 Venue: Baltimore, USA and Virtually. E-mail: neurology@magnusconference.com Phone: 1 (702) 988 2320 WhatsApp: +1 (540) 709-1879 Website: https://neurologycongress.com/
